TitleEnglish: Master of Martial Hearts - Platonic Heart
SummaryEnglish: Walking home from school Aya Iseshima stumbles upon a brutal brawl between two girls fighting over something called the "Platonic Heart". Being a martial arts master herself Aya interferes in the fight to break it up. Afterwards Aya befriends one of the fighters and finds out the Platonic Heart is a jewel that can grant one wish for any girl that posseses it and there is a battle royal tournament going on for its control. Unfortunately for Aya it seems her interference has now registered her as a participant in the fight and it looks like there's no way out but to win.

1.SummaryEnglish: Aya is a lethal knockout with a heart of gold and fists of fury. After breaking up a catfight between two scantily-clad brawlers, she finds herself involved in a clandestine martial arts tournament!

2.SummaryEnglish: Aya's next match pits her against a curvy chemistry teacher with all the right moves. Neither fighter wants to mess up their opponent's pretty face, but in this tournament, the penalty for losing is death!

3.SummaryEnglish: Aya proves she can hold her own in a poolside battle with a naughty policewoman. Later, she takes on three sexy sisters simultaneously before meeting the mystery man behind this deadly tournament.

4.SummaryEnglish: In her semi-final match, Aya ditches her tattered schoolgirl uniform in favor of a kitty-themed maid costume. Her new look drives the crowd wild, but Aya only cares about punishing her opponent!

5.SummaryEnglish: Aya succeeds in reaching the final round of the tournament, but she'll have to defeat a clairvoyant opponent in order to learn the horrifying truth behind the Platonic Heart.
